Package at.htlkaindorf.tools

Class WorldCreator

java.lang.Object
at.htlkaindorf.tools.WorldCreator
public class WorldCreator
extends java.lang.Object
Used to create all hitboxes and objects (Enemies, Collectables, LevelEnds) in a level.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    WorldCreator​(PlayScreen screen)
    Gets the current season and creates the terrain, all enemies, collectables and levelEnds.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void createTerrain​(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world, com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMap map)
    Creates the collision hitboxes based on the areas in the tiled map.

      public WorldCreator​(PlayScreen screen)

  • Method Details

    • createTerrain

      public void createTerrain​(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world, com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMap map)
      Creates the collision hitboxes based on the areas in the tiled map.
      Parameters:
      world - the world which contains the current level
      map - the map which contains the areas where the hitboxes should be created
      Since:
      1.0
